about_the_game:
The DLC for the averagely popular game "Gnomes and Knights" will give you the opportunity get the experience of communicating with Despicable Dwarf *, who will explain in free form how to become successful ** and how to catch a gnome. ***

Features of the DLC:

  • The ability to communicate with Despicable Dwarf in the digital space

  • Reading text or skipping it using the keyboard or mouse

  • The duration of reading the monologues of the Despicable Dwarf is approximately 30-40 minutes or less

  • The inability to catch gnomes, they are simply not in the DLC

  • Unreasonably high price

  • Gaining invaluable experience in real life ****

* The real name of the character is not an insult.

** Is not a real recommendation for achieving success. Does not guarantee the result, is purely entertaining.

*** You will not learn how to catch gnomes with the help of this add-on, the dwarf is lying.

**** Not guaranteed.

The DLC for the averagely popular game "Gnomes and Knights" will give you the opportunity get the experience of communicating with Despicable Dwarf *, who will explain in free form how to become successful ** and how to catch a gnome. ***

Features of the DLC:

  • The ability to communicate with Despicable Dwarf in the digital space

  • Reading text or skipping it using the keyboard or mouse

  • The duration of reading the monologues of the Despicable Dwarf is approximately 30-40 minutes or less

  • The inability to catch gnomes, they are simply not in the DLC

  • Unreasonably high price

  • Gaining invaluable experience in real life ****

* The real name of the character is not an insult.

** Is not a real recommendation for achieving success. Does not guarantee the result, is purely entertaining.

*** You will not learn how to catch gnomes with the help of this add-on, the dwarf is lying.

Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Recommended:

short_description: On the Path of Success you will meet Despicable Dwarf, who tells you how to become successful and, perhaps, shares wisdom about methods of catching gnomes. A long motivational monologue of very controversial content awaits you. There is nothing else to do in the DLC. You can't catch gnomes either.
supported_languages:
English, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Turkish, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Icelandic, Kazakh, Latvian, Lithuanian, Estonian
*languages with full audio support
